## Short explanation

In this quarto file we practise making r and python code with quarto.
```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
data <- mtcars
avg <- mean(data$mpg)
paste("Mean of entries in the column data$mpg is equal to ", avg)
```

```{python}
import pandas
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
```

```{python}
iris = load_iris(as_frame=True)
data_frame = iris.frame
data_frame.plot(x="sepal length (cm)", y="sepal width (cm)", kind="scatter", marker="o", title="Line plot (pandas)")
plt.show()
```
